A

accel(byte) - Method in class Motor
controls acceleration of motors: steps to new speed = (new speed - old speed) / acceleration value time to new speed = steps * 25 ms
accel(int) - Method in class Motor
controls acceleration of motors: steps to new speed = (new speed - old speed) / acceleration value time to new speed = steps * 25 ms

Responds to any action by calculating the location of drawings, and then making them again.
